com.ikalagaming.core.events

Class NodeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.event.Event

  • public class NodeEvent
extends Event
    An event that relates to nodes.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeEvent

        public NodeEvent(java.lang.String from,
                 java.lang.String to,
                 java.lang.String message)
        Creates a new NodeEvent with the supplied parameters. There is no guarantee that only the intended node will receive the message.
        Parameters:
        from - the Node type of the sender
        to - the Node type of the intended receiver
        message - the data to transfer

    • Method Detail

        Returns the name of the node that is intended to receive the message, if any.

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()

        the message
